name: Doggo Dating
description:
Welcome to Doggo Dating! You have 2 ingame days to get one of two possible dogs to like you enough so that they will go on a wholesome play-date with you. 

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys & Space/Enter

IMPORTANT:

The game is not quite "finished"  nor complete and well polished. Sadly I wasn't able to put as much time in as I would liked to have. I totally want to work on a post jam version though. It'll release after the rating period is over :) 

Follow me on Twitter: @Obvious_Dev

Check out my YouTube Channel: Obvious Dev YouTube
